rules.description: Caps Lock recovery: Left Shift + Caps Lock = real Caps Lock toggle
Combos: J+K=Space, D+F=Backspace, S+D=Tab, K+L=Enter, F+G=Esc
Layer 2 — Arrows: D=←, F=↑, J=↓, K=→, A=line start, Q=line end (Vimium mapping)
Layer 2 — Brackets: w=| e=( r=) s=[ c=] u={ i=} g=< h=> b=` v=\
Layer 2 — Navigation: y=Home, t=PgUp, o=PgDn, p=End
Layer 3 — Direct Cmd shortcuts + one-shot modifiers
